Powers -- Male Human Heroic Wizard
Attributes (10 Points):
Agility: d4 Smarts: d12 Spirit: d6 Strength: d8 Vigor: d10
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Young: -1 Attribute Points
Armor Interference: -4 Agility w/any armor or shield
Skills (16 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d6 Healing: (sma) d4 Shooting: (agi) d4
Battle: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d10
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Occult: (sma) d6 Stealth: (agi) d4
Faith: (spi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d6
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Aquan; Auran; Celestial; Common; Draconic
Skill Notes:
Young: -2 Skill Points
Armor Interference: -4 Spellcasting and Agility-based skills w/any armor or shield
Size: 0 Alignment: Neutral Deity: Pharasma (Neutral)
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 10; Edge: 12; Skill: 6
Features
Edges (8 points): Familiar: 1; Level Headed: 1; New Powers: 1; Power Points: 4; Wizard: 1 Hindrances: Obligation; Secret+; Young Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Bond: +1 Edge Points (Bonded Object or Familiar)
Wizard: Has Arcane Background (Wizard), Arcane Bond, Armor Interference, School, and Spellbooks features
Familiar: Can communicate w/magical, Wild Card pet that stores 5 Power Points
Obligation: Has regular responsibility that occupies 20 hr/wk
School: May select specialist school (free casting reroll) and two opposition schools (-2 casting rolls)
Secret+: Hides knowledge to protect self or others from major trouble
Young: +1 Benny each session
Combat
Parry: 3 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 9 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Leather Jacket Shield: Light Weapons: Lance (d8+d8); Light Mace (d8+d6); Short Spear (d8+d6 R4"); Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Level Headed: Choose best of 2 Action Cards
Arcana
Power Count: 5 Power Points: 30
Powers:
Arcane Protection: (1 PP) R12" Foes suffer -2 (Raise -4) on arcane attacks and damage against target for 5 rd
Baleful Polymorph: (3+2/size change PP) R12" Target becomes chosen animal for 5 rd (Spirit neg, Spirit-2 ends)
Banish: (3 PP) R12" Target suffers Shaken (Raise 1 wound), returns to native plane if incapacitated (Spirit neg)
Barrier: (2 PP) R12" Creates a 5" long (Raise 10") by 1" high wall for 5 rd
Beast Friend: (1/Size PP) R12" Target can speak with and control beast actions for 10 min
Blast: (3 PP) R24" 2" radius inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6)
Blind: (2 PP) R12" Target suffers -2 on vision tasks (Raise -4) (Vigor neg 2 points (Raise 4) each rd)
Bolt: (1 PP) R24" Inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6)
Boost/Lower Trait: (2 PP) R12" Target gains +1 trait step (Raise +2) for 5 rd or suffers -1 trait step (Raise -2) (Spirit recovers 1 step each rd)
Burrow: (2 PP) R12" Allows target to merge into earth for 5 rd
Burst: (2 PP) R9" Cone inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6)
Confusion: (1 PP) R12" 2" radius inflicts Distracted or Vulnerable (Raise both) for 1 rd
Conjure Item: (2/lb PP) R12" Creates mundane item that lasts 1 hr
Curse: (5 PP) RTouch Target suffers 1 level fatigue and additional level each sunset (Spirit neg)
Damage Field: (4 PP) R12" Creatures adjacent to target suffer 2d4 damage for 5 rd
Darksight: (1 PP) R12" Target ignores 4 points (Raise 6 points) of illumination penalties for 1 hr
Deflection: (2 PP) R12" Foes suffer -2 ranged or melee attacks (Raise both) on target for 5 rd
Detect/Conceal Arcana: (2 PP) R12" Target can detect supernatural effects for 5 rd or conceals target aura for 1 hr
Disguise: (2 PP) R12" Target assumes another's appearance for 10 min
Dispel: (1 PP) R12" End targeted power (Arcane skill neg)
Divination: (5 PP) RSelf 5 min contact with otherworld force grants arcane skill roll to gain information
Drain Power Points: (2 PP) R12" Drains 1d6 Power Points (Raise adds drained Power Points to self) (Spirit neg, +2 if types differ)
Elemental Manipulation: (1 PP) R12" Performs minor elemental manipulation for 5 rd
Empathy: (1 PP) R12" Self learns target emotions and surface thoughts, gains +1 Intimidation, Persuasion, Performance, and Taunt (Raise +2; Spirit neg) for 5 rd
Entangle: (2 PP) R12" Restrains target (Raise binds)
Environmental Protection: (2 PP) R12" Target gains protection from hazards for 1 hr (Raise 8 hr)
Farsight: (2 PP) R12" Target sees up to 1 mile for 5 rd (Raise halves range penalties)
Fear: (2 PP) R12" Target Extra flees, Wild Card rolls on fear table (Spirit neg)
Fly: (3 PP) R12" Target can fly for 5 rd
Growth/Shrink: (2/Size PP) R12" Target gains or loses Toughness and Strength step (Spirit neg) for 5 rd
Havoc: (2 PP) R12" Distracts and throws creatures in 2" radius or 9" cone 2d6" (Strength neg)
Healing: (3 PP) RTouch Restores 1 wound (Raise 2) suffered in past hr
Illusion: (3 PP) R12" Creates 2" radius visual illusion for 5 rd
Intangibility: (5 PP) R12" Target becomes unaffected by physical world for 5 rd (Spirit neg)
Invisibility: (5 PP) R12" Target becomes invisible, foes -4 sight-based actions (Raise -6) for 5 rd
Light/Darkness: (2 PP) R12" Creates 3" radius bright light or darkness for 10 min
Locate: (3 PP) RSelf Gives direction of chosen item (-2 if caster has never seen item, running water blocks spell) for 10 min
Mind Link: (1 PP) R12" Two targets communicate up to 1 mile telepathically (Raise 5 miles) for 30 min
Mind Reading: (2 PP) R12" Self gains 1 truthful answer from target (Smarts neg)
Mind Wipe: (3 PP) R12" Target forgets up to 30 min event (Smarts neg)
Object Reading: (2 PP) RTouch Self sees visions of history of target
Planar Binding: (8 PP) R12" Summons extraplanar creature to perform service (Spirit neg)
Plane Shift: (4 PP) R12" Self travels to chosen plane, w/in 10d10 miles of known location
Protection: (2 PP) R12" Target gains +2 Armor (Raise +2 Toughness) for 5 rd
Puppet: (3 PP) R12" Target obeys self (Raise complete control) for 5 rd (Spirit neg)
Relief: (1 PP) R12" Removes Shaken, Distracted, or Vulnerable (Raise 2 of these) or numbs 1 wound or fatigue penalty (Raise 2) for 1 hr
Resurrection: (20 PP) RTouch Successful -4 casting roll returns 1 yr corpse to life with 3 wounds and 2 fatigue (Raise 0 wounds)
Sanctuary: (2 PP) RTouch Evil creatures cannot attack target (Spirit neg) for 5 rd
Scrying: (3 PP) RSelf Self sees chosen target (-2 unfamiliar target, Spirit neg) for 5 rd
Shape Change: (3+ PP) RSelf Transforms into animal form for 5 rd
Sloth/Speed: (2 PP) R12" Target gains dbl Pace for 5 rd or suffers half Pace (Spirit ends)
Slumber: (2 PP) R12" Target sleeps for 1 hr (Spirit neg)
Smite: (2 PP) R12" Target weapon inflicts +2 damage (Raise +4) for 5 rd
Sound/Silence: (1 PP) R60" Creates sound up to shout or R12" mutes 3" radius for 5 rd
Speak Language: (1 PP) R12" Target speaks unknown language for 10 min
Stun: (2 PP) R12" Stuns target (Vigor neg)
Summon Ally: (2+ PP) R12" Creates obedient servant for 5 rd
Telekinesis: (5 PP) R24" Moves items remotely as Strength d10 (Raise d12) for 5 rd (Spirit neg)
Teleport: (2 PP) R12" Target teleports 12" (Raise 24")
Time Stop: (8 PP) RSelf Self gains additional turn
Wall Walker: (2 PP) R12" Target moves at half Pace (Raise full Pace) on vertical and inverted surfaces for 5 rd
Warrior's Gift: (4 PP) R12" Target gains combat edge effects for 5 rd
Wish: (20 PP) R12" Alters reality in exchange for permanent loss of 3 Power Points (Raise no loss)
Zombie: (3 PP) R12" Animates and controls corpse for 1 hr
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Wizard): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
New Powers: +2 Power Count
Power Points: +20 Power Points
Spellbooks: Must study bonded arcane book daily to cast spells
